item.title: Between Mona Lisa: Steganography?
item.description: Steganography The practice of hiding data inside something else like a physical object or a computer file. There are various ways to create hidden messages using steganography like using secrets inks, lights, musical pitch keys, and different encoding algorithms for digital data.
